channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Spectrum Protect for Virtual Environments
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Spectrum Protect for Virtual Environments

item.title: CVE-2021-20532|2024-08-03T17:45:44.555Z -- ibm -- spectrum%20protect%20for%20virtual%20environments
item.description: IBM Spectrum Protect Client 8.1.0.0 through 8.1.11.0 could allow a local user to escalate their privileges to take full control of the system due to insecure directory permissions. IBM X-Force ID: 198811.
